name: The Factory (itch) (piccolomago)
description:
INFO

Prototype of a top-down action platformer, where you collect items and avoid traps.

STORY

The factory generators were placed incorrectly and now all levels are out of control.

It's up to you to remove all generators from all levels and restore the order in the factory.

GAMEPLAY

Go to the end of each level and remove the generator from the central machine

but to go there you have to avoid obstacles that can damage you or kill you.

Featuring:

  • avoid lasers
  • try not to end smashed by a block,
  • move through platforms that will move in and out the wall,
  • walk on platforms that disappear and reappear
  • use consoles to turn off obstacles and open doors but some of them require a key to by used

CONTROLS

Move with 

Interact with

Menu with

Navigate menus with

I have built this prototype to get feedback about the game, so please if you play this prototype write your opinion about it.
